MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the WA9 postcode area of ST Helens, affecting properties in Wood Street, Holly Bank Grove and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:51PM on 24th October 2020.
